content.p: Student loans are offered by the Government of Canada to help students pay for post-secondary education. Funding is offered to eligible students in most provinces and territories. Nicola May is responsible for Canadian loan administration for study at the University of Nottingham UK campuses. Contact Nicola by email Overview of the loan application process and funding provided. Find out how we can support you, including loan form completion. Information for students from Canada. Find out about scholarships for study at the University. See answers to some of the most frequently asked questions. See additional information you may find helpful.
